description: IoTeX was founded as an open-source platform in 2017 with a vision for the Internet of Trusted Things, a decentralized ecosystem where humans and machines can interact with guaranteed security and trust. Poly Network is an interoperability protocol for heterogeneous blockchains. Poly Network has implemented interoperability with 11 heterogeneous chains including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Neo, Ontology, BSC, HECO, OKExChain, Polygon, Elrond, Zilliqa and Cosmos-SDK. Since the launch, the protocol has enabled cross-chain asset transfer of more than 9 billion U.S. dollars involving more than 180K addresses on different blockchains.

PolyDefy revolutionised farming by introducing a fully deflationary farming tokenomics.
Each transaction gets taxed 10% and allocated as follows:
4% of trade value towards farming rewards,
1.5% towards holders,
2% to Impermanent Loss Insurance (ILI ) fund,
2% is burnt and
0.5% goes towards marketing & team profit.
Impermanent Loss Insurance (ILI ) protects farmers from the ever present threat Impermanent Loss while farming, another revolutionary concept introduced by PolyDefy.

Toilet Protocol is a cryptocurrency that aims to recycle the trash tokens that exist on the Polygon Mainnet network. Too many tokens that are no longer useful on the Blockchain such as fraudulent tokens, rugpull, tokens that cannot be traded on the market and so on.
The mechanism of this protocol is that the trash token that is owned is sent to the Toilet Protocol smart contract so that this smart contract will issue a new token that is pTOI or can be called Proof of Recycle
How is the pTOI token different from other tokens? Many Coins and Tokens out there use Proof of Work (PoW) and Proof of Stake (PoS). Toilet Protocol uses an unprecedented Proof of Recycle (PoR), new tokens that can be printed through recycling.

BOLTR ECOSYSTEM
Boltr is an ecosystem for a decentralized non-custodial liquidity market protocol built on the high-speed Polygon POS Chain network. The ecosystem provides the services of Boltrswap and Boltrfarm alongside its governance token which is BOL.
1/Boltrswap (Decentralized Exchange)
Boltrswap is a decentralized exchange platform for swapping Polygon-Network tokens. It also uses an automated market maker model, meaning that there are no order books and liquidity pools are used instead.
2/Boltrfarm (Farming Platform)
In Boltrfarm, a user may earn income by becoming a liquidity provider; by adding their tokens to the liquidity pool on Boltrswap and receiving LP token as the collateral. They can farm LP tokens or stake BOL to earn rewards.
3/BOL (Governance Token)
BOL is the governance token inside the Boltr ecosystem. It was a solidity smart contract token powered by Polygon POS Chain.
BACKGROUND AND HISTORY
Founded in Q2 2021 a group of developers across four different countries and act as autonomous organisation under the name of Boltr Labs. Boltr Labs mission is to transform on how humanity react with an asset, just like in the traditional market humanity oftenly breeding biological asset in order to receive intangible asset in return. Timeleap Finance is here to create an ecosystem of high yield assets on Polygon chain, built to last with sustainable tokenomics. We set out to solve 3 main problems that plague yield farms; Inflationary tokenomics of yield farming tokens, emission rate drops to zero to control inflation / emulate Max Supply, buyback and burn hurts future governance.
 
With verifiable max supply of 86,400‌ and we’ve removed any possibility to write into MasterChef to alter the max supply of TIME, it gives us yield farmers a peace of mind that it truly is going to be a max supply of 86,400.‌
Emission will never ever drop emissions to zero, this means that there will always be a farm you can come back to. Limiting maximum supply wouldn’t raise inflation.
We implement a series of auto-compounding strategies (Buyback-and-Make) in our strategy contract, all with the aim of buying back TIME from the open market. MasterChef gets a share of TIME and the rest goes to our Treasury contract for future utility by our protocol.  This mean MasterChef can always transfer rewards, so long as there is a valid TIME balance in the MasterChef contract.
We are currently partnership with Jetswap and Wault.

The key difference between Playermon and other traditional games is its integration of the blockchain economic design to reward the players for their contributions to the ecosystem.
This new model of gaming has been dubbed, "play-to-earn" wherein players can earn by:
- Completing quests to gain rewards;
- Competing in different game modes to earn rewards;
- Upgrading and breeding pets;
- Selling and leasing NFT assets in the marketplace;
- Collecting rare Playermons on planets;
- Farming gems needed for in-game activities;
- Staking the governance token on Planet Pools; and
- Building space colonial base with decorative assets designed by the community.
This is a turn-based card gameplay system. All players need to form a team of Playermon. Each team consists of three Playermons.
Pre-battle, players are required to choose 3 Playermons and position them strategically. The placement of Playermons can provide an advantage over the opponent, so place them wisely.
Random ability cards are given to each player at the start of each turn. Afterwards, players will have to choose action cards for their Playermons. But they should keep in mind that each action card will cost an action point which is a limited resource. The player will be victorious once the opponent has no standing Playermon left.
The winner will gain SpaceGEM (SGEM) and the Playermons will gain experiences.
